title: Brian Clegg, “The Reality Frame: Relativity and Our Place in the Universe” (Icon Books, 2017)
description:
Brian Clegg is one of England’s most prolific and popular writers on science. His latest work, The Reality Frame: Relativity and Our Place in the Universe (Icon Books, 2017), covers Einstein’s Theories of Relativity and a whole lot more. Simply as an exposition of Einstein’s theories, the book is excellent...
